price: 43. C’est certes Nous Qui faisons vivre et faisons mourir, et c’est vers Nous que sera le devenir.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wa-ilaynā al-maṣīru
